simple_queries.name: Top Categories by Video Count
simple_queries.query: MATCH (v:Video)-[:VIDEO_BELONGS_TO_CATEGORY]->(c:Category) RETURN c.category_name, COUNT(v) as video_count ORDER BY video_count DESC LIMIT 10

simple_queries.name: Top Channels by Average Engagement
simple_queries.query: MATCH (ch:Channel)-[:CHANNEL_HAS_VIDEO]->(v:Video) RETURN ch.channel_title, AVG(v.engagement_ratio) as avg_engagement ORDER BY avg_engagement DESC LIMIT 10

simple_queries.name: Videos by Country
simple_queries.query: MATCH (v:Video)-[:VIDEO_TRENDING_IN_COUNTRY]->(co:Country) RETURN co.country_code, COUNT(v) as video_count ORDER BY video_count DESC

simple_queries.name: Top Videos by Views
simple_queries.query: MATCH (v:Video) RETURN v.video_id, v.title, v.views, v.country ORDER BY v.views DESC LIMIT 10

simple_queries.name: Most Tagged Videos
simple_queries.query: MATCH (v:Video)-[:VIDEO_HAS_TAG]->(t:Tag) RETURN v.video_id, v.title, COUNT(t) as tag_count ORDER BY tag_count DESC LIMIT 10

complex_queries.name: Channels with High Engagement Videos
complex_queries.query:
MATCH (ch:Channel)-[:CHANNEL_HAS_VIDEO]->(v:Video)
                WHERE v.engagement_ratio > 0.1
                RETURN ch.channel_title, 
                       COUNT(v) as high_engagement_videos,
                       AVG(v.engagement_ratio) as avg_engagement,
                       AVG(v.views) as avg_views
                ORDER BY high_engagement_videos DESC
                LIMIT 10

complex_queries.name: Category Performance by Country
complex_queries.query:
MATCH (v:Video)-[:VIDEO_BELONGS_TO_CATEGORY]->(c:Category),
                      (v)-[:VIDEO_TRENDING_IN_COUNTRY]->(co:Country)
                RETURN co.country_code, 
                       c.category_name,
                       COUNT(v) as video_count,
                       AVG(v.views) as avg_views,
                       AVG(v.engagement_ratio) as avg_engagement
                ORDER BY co.country_code, video_count DESC

complex_queries.name: Tag Co-occurrence with Categories
complex_queries.query:
MATCH (v:Video)-[:VIDEO_BELONGS_TO_CATEGORY]->(c:Category),
                      (v)-[:VIDEO_HAS_TAG]->(t:Tag)
                WITH c.category_name as category, t.tag_name as tag, COUNT(v) as co_count
                WHERE co_count > 10
                RETURN category, tag, co_count
                ORDER BY category, co_count DESC
                LIMIT 50

complex_queries.name: Day-of-Week Trending Patterns
complex_queries.query:
MATCH (v:Video)-[:VIDEO_TRENDING_ON]->(d:Day)
                RETURN d.day_name, 
                       COUNT(v) as video_count,
                       AVG(v.views) as avg_views,
                       AVG(v.engagement_ratio) as avg_engagement
                ORDER BY video_count DESC

complex_queries.name: Cross-Country Video Analysis
complex_queries.query:
MATCH (v:Video)-[:VIDEO_TRENDING_IN_COUNTRY]->(co:Country)
                WITH v.video_id as video_id, COLLECT(co.country_code) as countries
                WHERE SIZE(countries) > 1
                RETURN video_id, countries, SIZE(countries) as country_count
                ORDER BY country_count DESC
                LIMIT 20
